title.rendered: Job openings in Digital Marketing Domain in Noida

content.rendered:
[vc_row pix_particles_check=””][vc_column][vc_column_text]Noida is one of the fastest emerging cities in India and the largest Digital and IT hub in India’s northern state of Uttar Pradesh. The city has become home for numerous IT Firms, Real Estate businesses, Hotels, Malls, Digital Marketing Agencies, and institutions.  Besides, there are various manufacturing enterprises, export houses, and multinational corporations located in this region.  These organizations are shifting their focus from traditional to digital media. They will require trained professionals with skills such as Search Engine Optimization, Social Media, Search Engine Advertising, Email Marketing, etc. The growth rate and future scope of Digital marketing in Noida are immeasurable. And choosing your career in this field will provide you with a fabulous career and incredible growth opportunities. If you have skills, knowledge, and passion then you will certainly get a great job as a digital marketer in Noida at a great salary package. Moreover, if you are a learner you can approach or join a Digital Marketing course in Noida to take your career to another level. And if you have these skills, you will find a lot of Digital marketing jobs in Noida matching your profile. You know, According to PayScale, the Average Salary of a Digital Marketing Manager in Noida is Rs 550,000. Now let’s look at the scope of swiftly growing and developing digital marketing domain.  

Scope of Digital Marketing:

The scope of the digital marketing domain can be contemplated by the rising popularity of the Internet across the globe, as there is no area that remains untouched by digital marketing. The world is witnessing the digital revolution as more and more people have started depending on the Internet for their basic needs. You can see clearly the prominence of Digital marketing for Industries. Moreover, the digital marketing job market is flooding with opportunities like never before, as businesses are in urgent need of skilled talent in the Digital marketing field.  Companies have started keeping bigger budgets for digital marketing. So, certainly, in the coming years, there will be loads of opportunities with great salary packages. The digital field has no boundaries and the scope is limitless, with diverse modules like Search Engine Optimization, Social media, Content marketing and writing, Email marketing, Adwords, and much more.  

Scope for Businesses

Every business wants a cheaper way to connect with the audience to promote their business or products. And digital marketing provides them the most convenient as well as an economical way of interacting with the audiences to advertise their business, services, or products. Presently, digital media is dominating the entire Marketing domain. Having a powerful online brand presence is really important for every brand or business, and without it, your business will be considered non-existing. Hence, in the future, you will see every business going digital because of the growth opportunities and profit offered by this field.  Businesses can surely witness a flood in their profits and ROI if they keep investing in Digital marketing Moreover, as a business, you need to keep your digital marketing strategies updated with the latest technologies to achieve better and bigger results.  

For Jobseekers & Professionals

The digital marketing domain is seeing a massive hike in the number of professionals and learners choosing digital marketing as a career from the past few years. You can say it’s like a new MBA for the current generation. People from various domains and sectors have started connecting with the digital industry to build a promising and successful career for a bigger and better future. The field has certainly proven to be the most preferred option for professionals and jobseeker due to its versatility and adaptability to modern technology.  

The Future Trends

Sooner or later every business has to adapt to digital marketing as it’s not just a technology but need of the hour. However, to keep ahead of others it’s necessary to keep yourself updated with the latest trend. Here are the 7 disciplines that will dominate the digital marketing field in the future:
  • Voice searches
  • Video marketing
  • Live Videos
  • Chatbots
  • Artificial Intelligence
  • Machine Learning
  • Augmented and virtual reality, etc.
These technologies are meant to provide customers better user experience. Consequently, as a learner, you can learn and acquire these trending technologies for staying ahead of the rat race.  

Digital Marketing Jobs in Noida:

Apparently, Digital marketing is the future and you can foresee exponential growth career-wise. So, let’s look at the Highest paying digital marketing job profiles in Noida:  

1. Search Engine Optimization Jobs

The future of a Digital Marketer having expertise in SEO is vivacious. The search engine algorithms are continuously changing and upgrading with time. To remain on the top and ahead of competitors, businesses need SEO specialists. SEO helps a business to get huge traffic on a website without investing a single cent. And that’s there are tremendous job openings in the SEO field.  An SEO person is responsible for analyzing, reviewing, and optimizing websites to improve website traffic and ranking position in the SERPs.
Available Jobs Profiles:
  • SEO Intern
  • SEO & Webmaster
  • Link Building Expert
  • SEO Executive
  • SEO Specialist/ Consultant
Salary Range:
The average salary range of an SEO specialist in India is 4,50,000 – Rs. 6,00,000. Moreover, an SEO expert having  8+ years of experience can earn in the range of 9,50,000 to Rs.15,00,000.  

2. Social Media Jobs

The social media specialist job role is divided into two parts.
  1. Social media Optimization: Expand the content through social media platforms.
  2. Social Media Marketing: Run paid Ads
Available Jobs Profiles:
  • Social Media Intern
  • Social Media Moderator/ Executive
  • Social Media Specialist/Consultant/Community Manager
Salary Range:
The average pay scale of a social media manager ranges from 480,000  to 12,00,000 rupees annually depending on the experience and type of the organization.  

3. Content Marketing Jobs

Content marketing is a strategic approach in which engaging and customer-based content is prepared to draw customers to the website.  It’s the most trending skill as every business is now investing in content marketing for generating unique content to remain on the top of SERPs.  One more benefit of having a career in content marketing is that you can work as a freelancer as well.
Available Jobs Profiles:
  • SEO Content Writer
  • E-commerce Content Writer
  • Web Copywriter
  • Content Marketing Consultant/ Specialist
Salary range:
Presently, Content Marketing is the most searched profile. A content marketer’s salary starts from Rs. 3,50,000 even for the beginner level positions, and goes up to Rs. 12,00,000 after 5-6 years of experience.  

4. Search Engine Marketing (SEM) Jobs

Search engine marketing is a paid type of marketing. It’s an essential part of digital marketing that deals with advertising a website/Product/Service in search engine through paid advertising.
Available Jobs Profiles:
  • SEM specialist
  • SEM Expert
  • Ad manager
Salary range:
The average salary for Search Engine Marketers is 468,000 to 12,00,000  

5. Analytics & Optimization Jobs

Analysis and optimization is a continuous process that includes acquiring the audience data related to your business and customizing your business website accordingly.  Analyzation of customer behaviors & generating custom reports related to the business goals is the major task of an analyst.
Available Jobs Profiles:
  • Web Analyst
  • CRO Specialist
  • Digital Analytics Specialist- Mobile, Web, Email, Social Analytics
Salary range :
The salary range of an analyst starts at Rs. 3,00,000 and can go up to Rs. 15,00,000 as per the experience.  

6. Email Marketing Jobs

As the name implies, email marketing is a way of promoting your business by sending commercial messages through emails. It involves sending emails for requesting business, ads, sales to potential customers. However, Email marketing cannot be considered a specific profession. It’s usually blended with design, analysis, Content, usability.  Hence, the availability of jobs is not that large. An Email marketing manager works with various teams to reach the goal.
Available Job Profiles:
  • Email Marketing Specialist
  • Email Campaign Specialist
  • Email Marketing Executive
Salary range :
The entry-level salary for email marketer begins from Rs. 2,80,000 to Rs. 5,00,000. Moreover, It can be up to Rs. 10,00,000 depending on the experience.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
